footer_closure_cta_desc: Join 12,000+ customers who have already upgraded their productivity. One-time purchase, lifetime access.
footer_closure_cta_title: Ready to Transform Your E-Ink Experience?
footer_closure_faq_1_answer: Yes! Our templates are in industry-standard PDF format and work on ALL major e-ink tablets including reMarkable 2, Paper Pro, Supernote, Boox, Kindle Scribe, Kobo, and even iPad apps like GoodNotes and Notability.
footer_closure_faq_1_question: Will these templates work on my device?
footer_closure_faq_2_answer: After purchase, you'll receive an instant download link. Simply download the PDF files and transfer them to your device via USB, cloud sync, or email. Each device has different methods - we include step-by-step instructions for all major devices.
footer_closure_faq_2_question: How do I transfer the templates to my device?
footer_closure_faq_3_answer: You get 200+ premium templates across 10 categories: Daily Planners, Goal Trackers, Project Management, Finance Tools, Study Templates, Creative Spaces, Travel Journals, Wellness Logs, plus 500+ bonus stickers, 22 notebook covers, and our Mental Models guide.
footer_closure_faq_3_question: What's included in the Ultimate Collection?
footer_closure_faq_4_answer: Absolutely! When we release new templates or improvements, you get them free. No subscription fees, no expiration dates. One purchase = lifetime access to all current and future templates.
footer_closure_faq_5_answer: Instantly! After purchase, you'll receive an email with your download link within 2 minutes. No waiting, no shipping. You can start using your templates immediately.
footer_closure_faq_5_question: How quickly will I receive my templates?
footer_closure_faq_6_answer: We offer priority email support with response times under 24 hours. Plus, we include detailed setup guides and video tutorials. If you ever need help, we're here for you.
footer_closure_faq_6_question: What if I have questions after purchase?
footer_closure_faq_7_answer: Yes! You can use our templates for personal or commercial purposes. This includes using them for client work, business planning, content creation, and more. The only restriction is reselling or redistributing the template files themselves.
footer_closure_faq_7_question: Can I use these templates commercially?
footer_closure_faq_8_answer: Due to the digital nature of our products, we generally don't offer refunds. However, if you experience any technical issues, we'll work with you to resolve them. Contact us if you have any concerns before purchasing.
footer_closure_faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know before you buy
footer_closure_final_cta_desc: Join 12,000+ customers who have already upgraded their productivity. One-time purchase, lifetime access.
footer_closure_final_cta_title: Ready to Transform Your E-Ink Experience?
footer_closure_subtitle: We stand behind our products with these guarantees

problem_card_1_desc: You open your tablet and stare at an empty screen, unsure where to start.
